text: iseula-el jason-ege seonjijalo bonaelila naneun junim-eulobuteo yejung eul bad-assnola naega neohuileul wihayeo jinheulg-eulo saeui hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo sum eul bul-eoneoh-eumyeon hananim-ui heolag-eulo saega doel geos-ila hananim-i heolagha sil ttae naneun jangnimgwa mundeung-i deul-eul nasgehamyeo hananim-ui heolag-i iss-eul ttae jug-eunjaleul salgehamyeo neohuiga mueos eul meog-eumyeo neohuiga mueos-eul jib-an-e chugjeoghaneungaleul neohuiege allyeo juli la neohuiege sin-ang-i iss-eul ttae neohui leul wihan yejeung-i issnola
